from planetarypy.config import config
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
storage_root = config.storage_root
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
stems = []
for f in storage_root.rglob('*'):
    if not f.is_dir() and not "indexes" in f.parts:
#         print(f)
        stems.append(f.stem)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
ind = pd.Index(stems)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
ind
